statements: UPDATE influencer_fraud_detection SET followers_count = 10000 WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE influencer_fraud_detection SET engagement_rate = 8.75, suspicious_behavior = TRUE WHERE influencer_id = 2;
UPDATE influencer_fraud_detection SET followers_count = followers_count + 500, engagement_rate = 7.25 WHERE influencer_id = 123
UPDATE influencer_fraud_detection SET suspicious_behavior = TRUE, influencer_name = 'Updated Influencer' WHERE influencer_id = 456
UPDATE Influencers SET follower_count = 1000 WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE SuspiciousActivities SET activity_type = 'Fake Activity' WHERE influencer_id = 2;
UPDATE Influencers SET follower_count = 10000, engagement_rate = 5.7 WHERE influencer_id = 101;
UPDATE SuspiciousActivities SET activity_date = '2022-10-28', activity_type = 'Bot Activity' WHERE influencer_id = 201 AND activity_id = 301;
UPDATE Influencers SET followers_count = 15000 WHERE influencer_name = 'Lily';
UPDATE Posts SET post_likes = 500, post_comments = 100 WHERE influencer_id = 101;
UPDATE Influencers SET followers_count = followers_count + 100 WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE Posts SET post_comments = post_comments + 5, post_likes = post_likes + 10 WHERE influencer_id = 2 AND post_id = 5;
UPDATE Influencers SET followers_count = 5000 WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE Posts SET comments_count = 50, likes_count = 100 WHERE post_id = 10;
UPDATE Influencers SET engagement_rate = 5.7, followers_count = followers_count + 100 WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE Posts SET post_text = 'New post content', likes_count = likes_count + 50, comments_count = comments_count + 10 WHERE post_id = 3;
UPDATE Influencers SET followers_count = 500 WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE Posts SET post_content = 'Updated post content' WHERE post_id = 10;
UPDATE Influencers SET followers_count = followers_count + 100 WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE Posts SET post_content = 'New post content' WHERE post_id = 5;
